statements: UPDATE ImageFeatures SET image_name='new_image_1' WHERE id=1;

UPDATE ImageFeatures SET image_name = 'new_image_1', date_created = '2022-01-15 10:30:00' WHERE id = 1;

UPDATE ImageFeatures SET feature_vector = '\x0123456789ABCDEF' WHERE image_id = 1;

UPDATE image_features SET feature_vector = [1.2, 3.4, 5.6] WHERE id = 1;
UPDATE image_tags SET tag = 'nature' WHERE image_id = 2;
